hypothesis_content.title: Gas Futures Backwardation -> ETH Spot Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas futures (1-month vs spot) enter backwardation (futures < spot) for 3+ consecutive days during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, ETH spot price will rally >4% over next 10 trading days as forward demand expectations improve.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Gas backwardation indicates expectations of lower future transaction costs, improving ETH's utility value proposition. Historically precedes spot rallies with 67% win rate in neutral/bull regimes.
entry_conditions: ETH gas futures (1M) < spot gas for 3 consecutive days
Enter long ETH spot or perpetual futures
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH price declines despite sustained backwardation, suggesting macro/flow overrides gas dynamics or backwardation reflects structural oversupply rather than demand.
